text: te'one maro, jyam pana male ane te'one kadho tyanthi jyanthi te'o'e tamane kadhaya che ane (sambhalo) vidroha katlathi vadhare sakhata che ane masjide harama pase te'o sathe jhaghado na karo, jyam sudhi ke te'o pote tamara sathe jhaghado na kare, jo te'o tamara sathe jhaghade to tame pana te'one maro, inkari'o mate a ja badalo che
